# Lévy

> Lévy distribution.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var levy = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dists/levy' );
```

#### levy

Lévy distribution.

```javascript
var dist = levy;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

```javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();
var levy = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dists/levy' );

console.log( getKeys( levy ) );
```
